actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

official_title: To direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to enter into an arrangement with the National Academies of Sciences, Engineering, and Medicine to conduct a comprehensive study on the health care impacts of the use of kinetic impact projectiles in the United States, and for other purposes.
short_title: Analyzing Kinetic Impact Projectiles Against Americans Act

titles.title: Analyzing Kinetic Impact Projectiles Against Americans Act
Analyzing Kinetic Impact Projectiles Against Americans Act

To direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to enter into an arrangement with the National Academies of Sciences, Engineering, and Medicine to conduct a comprehensive study on the health care impacts of the use of kinetic impact projectiles in the United States, and for other purposes.
